column1: vajra vidAraNA DAraNI
AryavajravidAraNA nAma DAraNI om namaH BagavatyE Arya vajra vidAraNAyE
column2: @285a rgya gar skad du / badzra bi dh'a ra na n'a ma dh'a ra n'i / bod skad du / rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //

column1: evam mayA Srutam ekasmin samaye BagavAn vajrezu viharati sma
column2: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje la bzhugs te /

column1: sarva SarIram vajra mayam aDizWAya vajrapANiH ca budDa anuBAvena vajra samADim samApannaH
column2: sangs rgyas kyis mthus lag na rdo rjes lus thams cad rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //

column1: tatas vajrapANiH sarva budDa anuBAvena sarva budDa aDizWAnam sarva boDisattva aDizWAnaQca mahA kroDa samBUtam vajra sAram aBAzate sma acCedyam aBedyam satyam dRXam sTiram sarvatra apratihatam sarvatra aparAjitam sarva sattva vidrAvaNa karam
column2: de nas lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rdo rje khro bo las byung ba rdo rje snying pos rab tu smras te / mi thub pa / mi chod pa / mi shigs pa / bden pa / sra ba / brtan pa / thams cad du thogs pa med pa / thams cad du ma pham pa /

column1: sarva sattva utsAdana karam sarva vidyA AcCedana karam sarva vidyA stamBana karam sarva karma viDvaMsana karam
column2: sems can thams cad skrag par byed pa / sems can thams cad 'jil bar byed pa / rig @285b sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa /

column1: sarva karma vidrAvaNa karam sarva graha utsAdana karam sarva graha vimokzaNa karam sarva BUta AkarzaNa karam
column2: rig sngags thams cad gnon par byed pa / las thams cad 'joms par byed pa / gzhan gyi las thams cad 'jig par byed pa / gdon thams cad brlag par byed pa / gdon thams cad las thar par byed pa / 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa /

column1: sarva BUta nigrahaNa karam sarva vidyA mantra karma parAyaNa karam asidDAnAm sidDa karam
column2: 'byung po thams cad tshar gcod pa / rig sngags kyi las thams cad byed du 'jug pa / ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa /

column1: sidDa anAQcA vinASana karam sarva kAma pradAna karam sarva sattvAnAm rakzaNa karam SAntikam
column2: grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed pa / 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa / sems can thams cad srung ba / zhi ba / rgyas pa /

column1: pOzwikam sarva sattva anAQca stamBana karam sarva sattvAnAm ca mohana karam imam mantram
column2: sems can thams cad rangs par byed pa /

column1: mahAvalam budDa anuBAvena yakzendraH vajrapANiH pratyaBAzat
column2: rmugs par byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi mthu chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rjes rab tu smras so // na mo ratna tra y'a ya / na ma shtsanda badzra p'a na ye / ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye / tadya th'a /

column1: om namaH ratnatrayAya namaH caNxa vajrapANaye mahA yakza senApataye tat yaTA  om truwa truwa trowaya trowaya sPuwa sPuwa sPowaya sPowaya GurNa GurNa GurNA paya
column2: aom tra ta tra ta / tro ta ya tro ta ya / sphu ta sphu ta / spho ta ya spho ta ya; gh'urn'a gh'urn'a / gh'urnn'a pa ya gh'urn'a pa ya / sarba satva na / bo dha ya bo dha ya /

column1: GurNApaya sarva sattvAnAm viboDaya viboDaya samboDaya samboDaya Brama Brama saMBrAmaya saMBrAmaya sarva BUtAni kuwa kuwa saMkuwaya saMkuwaya sarva SatrUn Gawa
column2: sam bo dha ya sam bo dha ya / bhra ma bhra ma / sam bhra ma ya sam bhra ma ya / sarba bh'u t'a ni / kutta kutta / sam kutta ya sam kutta ya; sarba sha tr'u / ghatta ghatta / sam ghatta ya / sam ghatta ya /

column1: Gawa saMDAwaya saMGAwaya sarva vidyA vajra vajra sPowaya vajra vajra kawa vajra
column2: sarba bidy'a badzra badzra / spho ta ya badzra badzra / ka ta ya badzra badzra /

column1: vajra mawa vajra vajra maTa vajra vajra awwahAsa nIla vajrasu vajrAya svAhA
column2: ma ta ya badzra badzra / ma ta ya badzra badzra / ma tha badzra badzra / aatta ha @286a *// sa n'i la badzra / su badzra ya sv'ah'a / he phu llu / ni ru phu llu /

column1: om he fullu nirufullu nigRhNa kullu mili cullu kuru kullu vajravijayAya svAhA
column2: grihna kullu mi li tsullu / ku ru kullu / badzra be dza y'a ya sv'ah'a /

column1: om kilikIlAya svAhA om kawa kawa mawa mawa rawa rawa mowana pramowanAya svAhA
column2: k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'ah'a / ka ta ka ta / ma ta ma ta; ra ta ra ta / mo ta na / pra mo ta n'a ya sv'ah'a / tsa ra ni tsa ra / ha ra ha ra / sa ra sa ra /

column1: om cara nicara hara hara sara sara mAraya vajra vidAraNAya svAhA
column2: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya / badzra bi d'a r'a ya sv'ah'a / tsitshinda tstshinda / bhinda bhinda /

column1: om Cinda Cinda Binda Binda mahA kili kIlAya svAhA
column2: ma h'a k'i li k'i la ya sv'ah'a; bandha bandha /

column1: om banDa banDa kroDa kroDa vajrakilikIlAya svAhA
column2: kro dha kro dha badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'ah'a /

column1: om curu curu caNxakilikIlAya svAhA
column2: tsu ru tsu ru tsanda k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'ah'a /

column1: om trAsaya trAsaya vajrakilikIlAya svAhA
column2: tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'ah'a /

column1: om hara hara vajraDarAya svAhA
column2: ha ra ha ra / badzra d'a r'a ya sv'ah'a /

column1: om prahara prahara vajra praBaQjanAya svAhA
column2: pra ha ra pra ha ra / badzra pra bhanydza n'a ya sv'ah'a /

column1: om mati sTiH avajra Sruti sTira vajra pratisTiH avajra mahA vajra apratihata vajra amoGa vajraH Ehivajra SIGram vajrAya svAhA
column2: ma ti sthi ra badzra su ti sthi ra badzra / pra ti sthi ra badzra / ma h'a badzra / aa pra ti ha ta badzra / aa mo gha badzra / ae hi badzra / sh'i ghram badzra ya sv'ah'a / dha ra dha ra /

column1: om Dara Dara Diri Diri Duru Duru sarva vajra kulam AvartAya svAhA
column2: dhi ri dhi ri / dhu ru dhu ru / sarba badzra ku lam a'a ba rta ya sv'ah'a /

column1: amukam mAraya Paw
column2: aa mu kam m'a ra ya phat/

column1: om namaH samantavajrANAm
column2: na ma: sa manta badzra n'am/

column1: sarva balam Avartaya mahA bale kawa bale tatale acale maNxala maye ativajra mahA bale vegaraNa ajite jvala jvala tiwi tiwi tipiM
column2: sarba ba lam a'a brta ye ma h'a ba le ka ta be ta ta le / aa tsa le; manda la m'a ye / aa ti badzra / ma h'a ba le be ga ra na / aa dzi te / dzva la dzva la / ti ti ti ti / pim ga le da ha da ha / he dzo ba ti /

column1: Fgale daha daha tejovati tili tili banDa banDa mahA bale vajra aFkuSa jvAlAya svAhA om namaH ratnatrayAya

column1: anyonyAnAm arTa nASam taTA vyasanam eva ca Soka AyAsa upadrutAnAm Baya vyasanam eva ca graha nakzatra pIxA vA kAKa UH dAH dAruNAH grahAH
column2: sems can dbang po nyams pa dang // tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang // phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang // lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang // mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang // bran bza' la sogs gtses pa dang // phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang // nor 'grib pas ni gnod pa dang // mya ngan ngal dang gnod pa dang // 'jigs pa dang ni phongs pa dang // gza' dang rgyu skar byad stems dang // mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang // mya nga ngal las byung ba yi //

column1: pApakam paSyate svapne Soka AyAsa samucCritam
column2: rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang //
